body: Do you need permission from the official author to make a remix?
body_tagged: Do you need permission from the official author to make a remix?
title: Quick question

replies.body: No, it's only for sequals, not remix's
replies.body_tagged: No, it's only for sequals, not remix's

replies.body: Oh okay I see, my apologies. I didn't know that you do not need permission to make a remix.
replies.body_tagged: Oh okay I see, my apologies. I didn't know that you do not need permission to make a remix.

replies.body: Yes you do. If the orginal author isn't active like skippy or parapenguin, contact a mapdev. Same thing for sequels
replies.body_tagged: Yes you do. If the orginal author isn't active like skippy or parapenguin, contact a mapdev. Same thing for sequels

replies.body: I was told and others too have been told that for making a map remix no authorization was needed xd
replies.body_tagged: I was told and others too have been told that for making a map remix no authorization was needed xd

reply_to.body: Yes you do. If the orginal author isn't active like skippy or parapenguin, contact a mapdev. Same thing for sequels
